com.poesys.accounting.bs.account

Class AbstractEntityDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDaoDelegate<S>
      • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsEntity,IEntity,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>
        • com.poesys.accounting.bs.account.AbstractEntityDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.poesys.bs.delegate.IDataDelegate<BsEntity,IEntity,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityDelegate

    public abstract class AbstractEntityDelegate
extends com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsEntity,IEntity,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>

    A business delegate that provides an application programming interface for Entity objects and their dependents. You should not modify this class; instead, override or add methods in the class EntityDelegate, which specializes this class.

    The entity is the person or organization that owns all the accounts and the transactions in them and is the basis for the accounting statements

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
    See Also:
    EntityDelegate

      • createEntity

        public BsEntity createEntity(java.lang.String entityName)
                      throws com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException

        Create a new Entity with data fields.

        The Entity class has a natural key; this method creates the primary key from the appropriate input properties.

        Parameters:
        entityName - the name of the accounting entity; unique among all entities
        Returns:
        the new Entity object
        Throws:
        com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException - when there is a problem generating the key or creating the object

      • createFiscalYearAccount

        public BsFiscalYearAccount createFiscalYearAccount(BsAccount accountsObject,
                                                   BsFiscalYear yearsObject,
                                                   java.lang.String accountName,
                                                   java.lang.String entityName,
                                                   java.lang.Integer year,
                                                   java.lang.Integer orderNumber)
                                            throws com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException
        Create a new FiscalYearAccount association class child of Entity with an association key. This class links the input objects.
        Parameters:
        accountsObject - associated Account object (part of the key)
        yearsObject - associated FiscalYear object (part of the key)
        accountName - Attribute that is part of the association key
        entityName - Attribute that is part of the association key
        year - Attribute that is part of the association key
        orderNumber - the integer rank of the account in the list of accounts
        Returns:
        a new FiscalYearAccount business layer DTO
        Throws:
        com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException - when a parameter causes a problem

      • createAccount

        public BsAccount createAccount(BsEntity parent,
                               java.lang.String entityName,
                               java.lang.String accountName,
                               java.lang.String description,
                               java.lang.Boolean debitDefault,
                               java.lang.String accountType,
                               java.lang.Boolean receivable,
                               java.lang.Boolean active,
                               java.lang.String groupName)
                        throws com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException
        Create a new Account child of Entity with a composite key.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent of the child object to create
        entityName - composite super-key attribute that uniquely identifies child combined with child sub-key and any other parent super-keys
        accountName - the account name; unique within the entity
        description - text description of the nature of the account
        debitDefault - whether the account transaction items default to a debit or credit item; chosen as the "usual" value for items in this account
        accountType - the kind of account:
        • Asset: a kind of property with a value owned by the accounting entity
        • Liability: a kind of debt owed by the accounting entity to another entity
        • Equity: a kind of fund invested by the accounting entity in the business; the difference between value of assets and value of liabilities
        • Income: revenues paid to the accounting entity
        • Expense: money paid by the accounting entity to another entity
        receivable - whether this account is a receivable account, representing an asset that is a debt owed to the accounting entity
        active - whether the account is active at the present time.
        groupName - foreign key used by setter to query associated object
        Returns:
        a new Account business layer DTO
        Throws:
        com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException - when a parameter causes a problem
